description: Mz Berlin is a little off her rocker, that's why we love her so much! You never quite know what you are going to get when you're at the hands of this wildly sadistic dominatrix! Andrew Stone learns this first hand when he arrives at the Armory for a casting call interview and instead is thrown right into the spot light! Andrew's first experience is intense with whipping, tight bondage, wax play, chastity, ass worship, pegging and denial!
title: Mz Berlin's Casting Call Humiliation
